HeroSectionHeading: Tawafi Company for Pilgrims of Non-Arab African Countries
HeroSectionContent: This entity was officially established in 1404 AH as an institution limited to a closed and specific group of shareholders, specialized in providing Hajj services to pilgrims to the House of God.
Desc: This entity was officially established in 1404 AH as an institution limited to a closed and specific group of shareholders, specialized in providing Hajj services to pilgrims coming exclusively from non-Arab African countries, in line with the Kingdom's Vision 2030 AD and the directives of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The wise leadership - may God protect it - launched the Program for Serving the Guests of God, which aims to receive (30) million Hajj and Umrah pilgrims by the year 2030 AD.
ServiceHeading: Our services for the guests of God
Service1Content: Forming specialized professional work teams with unified standards and mechanisms that meet quantitative and qualitative description standards and offering multiple packages to suit different levels.
